constituent: dose, adjust, adjusted, sentence, plaid, kilt, Billy Connolly, two, fenceposts, cabers, sword, sabre, saber
heisigStory: Adjust . . . saber. Think of this as a dose of medicine.
koohiiStory1: When my medicine dose is way too large, I adjust it by cutting it into smaller pieces with my saber.
koohiiStory2: We had to adjust his dose slightly, after he went on a rampage with a sabre.
words: 洗剤(せんざい): detergent, washing material
